description.value:
You embody the link to your patron so completely that you can cast your hexes in rapid succession.

You are no longer limited to casting only a single hex each turn. In addition, when you cast @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Cackle]{Cackle} to sustain a hex, you gain the effects of @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Sustain a Spell]{Sustain a Spell} for all your active hexes that have a duration of sustained.
